product_name: Sony Action Cam Rechargeable Battery Pack
long_description: Bring along a spare Sony Action Cam Rechargeable battery pack to double the recording time of your Action Cam (sold separately) while you're capturing every thrilling moment of outdoor fun. Lithium ion battery provides enough power to shoot up to 80 min. of video or take 330 photos.
short_description: Bring along a spare Sony Action Cam Rechargeable battery pack to double the recording time of your Action Cam (sold separately) while you're capturing every thrilling moment of outdoor fun.
